title: Superior Iron Man Vol. 2: Stark Contrast (Hardcover)
description:
Tony Stark's wealth and influence are increasing across the globe, but it
could all be undone by the ultimate betrayal: One of his closest friends
is working against him! She can see what he's becoming, and she's
determined to prevent him from slipping even further. The Superior Iron
Man could meet his end at the hands of... Pepper Potts?! As Tony is left
reeling by shocking revelations, doubt begins to creep in, and his future
looks uncertain. Who or what lurks in Tony's old armor? Iron Man clashes
with Iron Man in an epic and surprising battle, but could it end in the
death of the Tony Stark we know and love? The Superior Iron Man is dead -
long live the Superior Iron Woman! Collecting SUPERIOR IRON MAN #6-9 &
IRON MAN (1968) #182.
